modName: The Door Is Held - A Tribute to a Beloved Character
summary: A tribute to a beloved character in Game of Thrones. Contains major spoilers, please do not enter if you have not watched S6E5 yet.
descriptionHtml:
Potential spoilers. Don't read the description or install this mod if you do not have an idea what this mod is about.




This mod adds an NPC named Hodor, accompanied by a wolf named Summer, at the Windhelm Stables. They cannot be recruited as followers.

It is a tribute to Hodor and the direwolf Summer. May they finally find peace and happiness in Skyrim, which were a luxury in their old home.



Credits:
HBO for the Game of Thrones drama adaptation series
George R.R. Martin for the original novels of A Song Of Ice And Fire
Bethesda for Creation Kit


I am working on a story-based follower mod, and would be honored and appreciative if you were able to lend me a hand in scripts and world shaping.
author: Anbeegod
